duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee outside plant, inside plant cable, and Small Cell Network construction on aerial, Utility Pole, and ground facilities.
Manage multiple construction projects simultaneously, ensuring completion according to timeline and budget.
Develop customer relationships and influence customers to award service work to the company.
Order and manage equipment and material for projects.
Review As Built drawings to validate quantities and maintain project tracking system.
Attend meetings and collaborate with stakeholders to address project issues and ensure successful completion.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required
